attributes.action: Remove Northern Rail from service due to performance, timetables and strikes!
attributes.background:
Northern Rail are a disgrace.
Timetables are changed which are inconvenient to many workers with families. Trains from when Jesus was a lad. Strikes every other week. Price rises.

Remove them from service now! (like you did with Virgin)

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/206088
